attributes.action: Encourage the electorate to vote out every [expense scandal tarnished] sitting MP by voting for independent candidates only at the next General Election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The only way to get the message through to the 659 burdens to the taxpayer is to vote them all out at the next election - VOTE AN INDEPENDENT CANDIDATE INTO WESTMINSTER!!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
